Engaging with an Emblem lasts for 3 turns. To engage again, you'll have to fill your engage meter through combat. Then keep an eye on how the battle is going, and engage when you need to! #FireEmblem https://t.co/DBmCDTqCx0

Emblems have two kinds of skills: sync skills and engage skills. Sync skills are triggered just by having a ring equipped, but engage skills only unlock when you're engaged with an Emblem. #FireEmblem https://t.co/BADrZQklL6

In #FireEmblem Engage, characters equipped with Emblem Rings can also engage‚Äîor merge‚Äîwith Emblems. While engaged, characters are able to use special weapons called "engage weapons," special skills called "engage skills," and ultra-powerful "engage attacks." https://t.co/qqP1D49IDA
